answer: Cloud computing is the delivery of computing services over the internet, including storage, processing power, and databases.
Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS), and Software as a Service (SaaS).
AWS is a comprehensive and widely adopted cloud platform offered by Amazon, providing over 200 fully featured services from data centers globally.
Serverless computing allows you to build. AWS Lambda is an example of serverless computing.
Benefits of cloud computing include cost savings, scalability, flexibility, disaster recovery, and security.
